segments.text: Tomorrow is my day off . I wonder if it's convenient to change our appointment from tomorrow to next Wednesday , still at the same time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid I won't be free next week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a shame.Will this afternoon be all right ? But I can only spare you an hour and a half today , from four o'clock .
segments.speaker: S1
